content:
ExpandCollapsePattern.ExpandCollapsePatternInformation Struct

Definition

Provides access to the property values of a ExpandCollapsePattern object using its stem.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.Current* or stem.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.Cached* accessors.

In this Article

public struct ExpandCollapsePattern.ExpandCollapsePatternInformation
Inheritance
Object
System.ValueType
ExpandCollapsePattern.ExpandCollapsePatternInformation

Properties

ExpandCollapseState

Gets the ExpandCollapseState of the AutomationElement.

public System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState ExpandCollapseState { get; }
Value
ExpandCollapseState

The ExpandCollapseState of AutomationElement.

Remarks

ExpandCollapseState refers to the visibility of immediate child objects only; it does not refer to the visibility of all descendant objects.

The default value is ExpandCollapseState.
